biotools.summary: microRNA expression and sequence analysis database is a database for the multivariate analysis of sequences and expression of microRNAs from multiple taxa. The database primarily comprises mature microRNA sequences and their target data, along with selected human, mouse and zebrafish expression data sets.

bioschemas.name: mESAdb
